_xResult.title: Floral Streetwear Inspired Maxi Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made winter maxi dress with turtle neck and thumb holes
_xResult.longdesc:
A winter wind ruffling the sea. A fall breeze that brushes the leaves on trees. Let this custom made winter dress transport you to the quiet places, full of beauty, that are barely grazed during the winter. You’ll be warm to enjoy nature in the handcrafted maxi made out of soft brushed cotton. Can't you just picture yourself in it? Snuggly, comfy but incredibly fashionable.

 

Details we love about this abaya style maxi: gorgeous print, thick fabric, and extra-long sleeves with thumb holes! And also, the oversized turtleneck looks modern and edgy while keeping the chill away. It's got a streetwear-inspired style combined with feminine print, which we think is the most marvelous contrast! Wear this style from Bulgaria before it hits the streets of America.

 

Please provide the desired length of your dress, as measured from the top of your shoulder, over bust to floor as long as you want it. Use the field below for this and any additional measurements or customization requests.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing - we love their fresh designs and European style! We especially love that they make modest clothing that isn't boring.

properties.propvalue: Hand wash cold or gentle cycle
